name: NUNYOCOMPANY
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Biographical conversations, and a touch of comedy, with renowned or influential figures. Nunyo Demasio — an award-winning journalist, New York Times bestselling author and budding comedy writer — engages his distinguished guests about their careers, indispensable life lessons and topical subjects. One staple of the show is that each figure offers a joke, grades a few by the host and reveals a favorite comedian. Articles based on each episode will appear on Apple News.
